pageTitle: Canon EOS 50D vs. EOS Rebel 550/T2i: Canon Rebel (EOS 1200D-300D) Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   So, which one should I go for and why? The camera will be used for several purposes, but mostly for vacation phtographs, as well as landscapes, buildings, city photography and some low light work - especially sunsets, sunrises, and night scenes. I was originally planning to go with the 550D/T2i, but after seeing how reasonable the 50D is now, I'm really considering spending an extra $50 to get the 50D. I'm looking to make my first DSLR purchase and I'm torn between these two cameras... Hello,
